name: I Am: SMTOWN Live At Madison Square Garden (Widescreen)

reviews.name: I Am: SMTOWN Live At Madison Square Garden (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText:
Well I love k-pop so I would recommend it to some fandom people who have to have everything their favorite band is involved with.
SHINee <3
reviews.title: 12 February 2013

reviews.name: I Am: SMTOWN Live At Madison Square Garden (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: It is a SMtown concert featuring all of it's major artists(Excluding Exo) that is worth having in the collection. It offers a documentary of how the singers got to where they are and their feelings on being able to perform at Madison Square Garden. On top of having the documentary on it, you get the whole concert that is played at parts in the documentary. Amazing performances by every artist, you won't regret getting this dvd! If you love Kpop, this is a perfect dvd to have :)
reviews.title: Excellent concert by SM worth having

reviews.name: I Am: SMTOWN Live At Madison Square Garden (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: It is a very nice documentary on some of the best of Kpop and great, catchy music!
reviews.title: Fantastic for Kpop fans.

reviews.name: I Am: SMTOWN Live At Madison Square Garden (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I love the movie! Walmart should definitely sell more kpop merchandise!!
reviews.title: Sell more kpop!
